title: Ban appeal
body: My account name is grey fullebuster and i was banned a year ago for being toxic. I have spent hundreds of dollars on the game (not an excuse) and i was rightfully banned. It has been a year and i have rethought my life as a whole and become a better person from different experiences. If possible i would like for my account to be unbanned. I can understand if u do not unban me but i would like to just ask for this request anyway.

replies.body:
Hi summoner,

Like Heartvine said yesterday, we cannot help you on the boards due to this being an account specific inquiry. Your best bet is to go through [player support.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)

I would also like to reiterate that it is very unlikely that you will get your account unbanned since it was rightfully banned in the first place.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=XEv38qua,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-19T08:45:41.084+0000)
>
> Hi summoner,
> 
> Like Heartvine said yesterday, we cannot help you on the boards due to this being an account specific inquiry. Your best bet is to go through [player support.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)
> 
> I would also like to reiterate that it is very unlikely that you will get your account unbanned since it was rightfully banned in the first place.

ok thankyou
